item.title: Zambia dismisses US health warning after toxic spill in copper mining area
item.description: Zambia's government says the water is safe to drink after the US embassy ordered its staff to withdraw.

item.title: Ex-Superman actor says he's becoming ICE agent
item.description: Dean Cain says he'll be "sworn in as an ICE agent asap" following a recruitment drive by the agency.

item.title: Why Trump-Putin talks unlikely to bring rapid end to Ukraine war
item.description: Even with Trump's direct involvement, Moscow's preconditions for a ceasefire in Ukraine make a swift ending to the bloodshed difficult to reach.

item.title: Trump's sweeping new tariffs take effect against dozens of countries
item.description: The president also hit India with a 50% tariff and threatened a 100% levy on foreign-made computer chips.

item.title: Tears and outrage in South Africa as accused in pig farm murder walks free
item.description: Adrian de Wet says he was forced to throw the bodies of two black women into the pig enclosure.
